Item.Name: Landscape of Flavors
Item.Content:
Landscape of Flavors in Disney's Art of Animation Resort, Disney's Art of Animation Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Landscape of Flavors

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/16472580.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Please your “palette” with quick-and-delicious fare inspired by international and American favorites—including build-your-own burgers, tandoor oven-roasted meats and veggies, and an array of hot and iced coffee drinks.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

WDWNT Reviews

Item.Name: In-Room Dining - Disney's Art of Animation Resort
Item.Content:
Pizza Delivery & More - Disney's Art of Animation Resort in Disney's Art of Animation Resort, Disney's Art of Animation Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Pizza Delivery & More - Disney's Art of Animation Resort

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/18146661.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Paint a portrait of the perfect piece of pie—draw up the inspiration to order an oven-fresh pizza, along with a bottle of beer or glass of wine. Then, treat your sweet tooth to something extra special, including a slice of carrot cake.
